thread.title: Kaley Cuoco Quotes Winnie the Pooh to Thank Fans for Support Post Divorce
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco Quotes Winnie the Pooh to Thank Fans for Support Post Divorce

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kaley Cuoco Quotes Winnie the Pooh to Thank Fans for Support Post Divorce
text:
Comments Thanking fans for their outpouring support ever since she split from husband Ryan Sweeting, Kaley ensures them she has started 'the next chapter' in her life. 
Life has been hard for Kaley Cuoco since she and husband Ryan Sweeting decided to call off their marriage after just 21 months. Though so, " The Big Bang Theory " star managed to survive, thanks to the supports her family, friends, and fans have given. On Wednesday, October 21, she thanked her fans for helping her get through the heartbreak in an emotional Instagram post. Kaley posted an adorable Winnie the Pooh picture which featured an uplifting quote that read "Piglet noticed that even though he had a very small heart, it could hold a rather large amount of gratitude." The actress accompanied the image with a short message that read, "I'm feeling completely overwhelmed with the outpouring of kindness and support from the people that surround me and from those I have never even met. I want you to know, I read all your comments and your sweet words have touched me deeply." The newly single entertainer went on adding, "I'm incredibly grateful for all your love as I start this next chapter in my life." A photo posted by @normancook on Oct 20, 2015 at 8:48pm PDT Kaley announced through her representative last month that she and Ryan are divorcing. "Kaley Cuoco and Ryan Sweeting have mutually decided to end their marriage," her rep said in a statement. "They ask for privacy at this time. No further statement will be issued regarding this matter."
